page.title: 14POPULATION OF GRIN.TON AREA
page.content: This area covers Grin'ton and part of W.Bradford and Ch'burn.The total pop. based on the 1981 census is approx. 2,000 in total who fall into the follow -ing age pattern:OVER 65 YRS-18%, BETWEEN 17 AND 65 YRS-66%,11 TO 17 yrs- 5%,5 TO 11 yrs-7%,UNDER 5 YRS-4%.The working pattern broadly divides into commuters in the professional class who travel outside the area and manual workers based on Ribblesdale Cement works and associated quarries,I.C.I. Catalyst Plant,road haulage and for females cotton textiles and garment manufacture.There is a smaller group operating family farms,forestry and road maintenance work.Apart from those retired there are very few people unemployed but problems are being encountered in finding suitable train- ing for those leaving school aged 16 yrs.or a little older.
